name: PhotoLoco
description:
Learn more about your community by sharing photos from your locale. 

Considering the distributed network of people that accumulate in Discord servers, these worlds may be from far-flung corners of the globe, thus allowing people to gain perspective of differences and similarities between their own culture and situation and those of others.

— by the Ludic Language Pedagogy (LLP) Game Design Crew

  • Cheapshot — initial idea
  • Marco — facilitator and game design
  • Carlos — game design, graphic design 
  • Jonathan — game design 

https://www.llpjournal.org
